column4: my friend burnt me a cd of pictures, but it takes forever to load in nautilus. I typed cdck in a terminal and it said "! TOC and lseek() return different information about size.." am I right to assume that this is the problem? and if so how can I fix it (make a clean copy of the disc maybe?)
why not have him give it to you on usb key or reburn cd
sorry to hijack, but doesn't that k9copy ONLY remove css and none of the newer protections like anydvd does or has it been updated?
not sure as I have not tried that with the latest DRM
